name: Merchium Shopping Cart
author: Simtech Ltd.

sections.description:
Merchium is the most powerful shopping cart for your WordPress website.

Start your online store in seconds: just install the Merchium WordPress plugin and complete the short setup. In a moment, your store will be set up and ready to sell.

Portable Power

Merchium is unbeatable in respect of feature richness. Your customers will enjoy seamless shopping experience with fast cloud search and one-page checkout, and you, as a storeowner, will have the access to tons of advanced eCommerce features, like flexible promotion system, built-in CMS, visual design editor, etc.

Merchium supports 45+ payment gateways right off the bat and lets you accept payments with credit cards, PayPal, and other popular options.

Thanks to integration with major shipping services like FedEx and USPS, Merchium calculates shipping rates on the fly.

Merchium is localized into over a dozen languages and lets your customers change between currencies; all prices are converted in real time.

Easy to Customize

Merchium has an on-site visual editor that lets you change your storefront’s color scheme, fonts, backgrounds, and more. No HTML or CSS knowledge required!

You can create a specific layout and choose a style for every location you have a storefront at, e.g. WordPress, Facebook, company’s website, and so on.

Mobile-Friendly

Merchium looks great on all screen sizes thanks to its responsive design and the specially crafted mobile storefront by Twigmo.

The mobile storefront was created from scratch with touch interface in mind. It utilizes familiar touch gestures to deliver the best shopping experience to mobile users.

Facebook Store

You can embed your Merchium store right in your Facebook page. Your catalog and orders will be synced across all your storefronts.

Actually, you can embed a storefront in any website that allows custom JavaScript code: Joomla, Wix, WordPress, and so on.

Learn more about Merchium at merchium.com.
sections.installation:
Automatic

  1. Go to your WordPress admin panel → Plugins
  2. Click Add New
  3. Type Merchium in the search box and click Search Plugins
  4. Click Install Now under the Merchium Shopping Cart entry
  5. After the plugin is installed, click Activate Plugin
  6. Go to Merchium Store in your WordPress admin panel and follow the setup instructions

Manual

  1. Download the plugin from this page
  2. Go to your WordPress admin panel → Plugins
  3. Click Add New
  4. Click Upload
  5. Click Browse…, and pick the saved plugin archive (.zip file)
  6. Click Install Now
  7. After the plugin is installed, click the Activate Plugin link
  8. Go to Merchium Store in your WordPress admin panel and follow the setup instructions
sections.faq:
How much does it cost?

See the full pricing on our site.

Is there a trial?

Yes, you can try Merchium with our risk-free 15-day trial.

Do I need a credit card to register?

Nope. You’ll just need an e-mail to register. The registration is absolutely free. And it won’t take longer than a few seconds.

How is it better than Ecwid?

Merchium is more feature rich. Whereas Ecwid is a very basic shopping cart, Merchium has many advanced features.
